topicTitle: I was unrightfully banned just now (8:42 PM US East)

posts.postText: My Steam name is |501st|{ZOT}§ÇÑVollar and I was playing on Jailbreak just now, sebat or something like that, doorkilled me, and then I got banned. I know a few other people on there, Mime...mime something, an admin, can someone help???
